summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Support Module functionality including Dashboard stats, Ticket Inbox, Ticket Detail with reply functionality, and frontend Support page tabs navigation

minor_bugs.impact: Legacy endpoint failing, but main support endpoints work fine
minor_bugs.note: Main support module uses /api/v1/support/tickets which works perfectly

passed_tests: Support Dashboard Stats API - all required fields present
Support Tickets List API - returns seeded tickets with proper structure
Ticket Detail & Reply API - can add messages and update status
Support Chats API - working (no active chats)
Knowledge Base API - returns KB articles
Canned Responses API - returns responses with proper structure
Support Module Seeding - successfully seeds data
Frontend Support page navigation - works perfectly
Support page tabs navigation - all 5 tabs working
Dashboard stats display - shows Open Tickets, Active Chats, CSAT Score
Ticket Inbox UI - shows ticket queue with seeded tickets
Ticket Detail UI - displays ticket thread and details
Reply functionality UI - can enter and send replies
Live Chat UI - shows console and simulate button
Knowledge Base UI - displays KB articles in table
Canned Responses UI - shows responses with add functionality
